resources.string:
Convert Your Grade in German System 
(using Modified Bavarian Formula)

1 – 1.5 Sehr Gut (Very good) 
1.51 – 2.5 Gut (Good) 
2.51 – 3.5 Befriedigend (Satisfactory) 
3.51 – 4 Ausreichend (Sufficient) 
4.01 – 6 Nicht Ausreichend (Not sufficient)

Apps developer

 Mohammed Mahmudul Hasan
 Student, Department of CSE
 Daffodil International University
